mapper.sql: select d.dept_id, d.parent_id,d.jbdm, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT jbdm from sys_dept d left join sys_role_dept rd on d.dept_id=rd.dept_id WHERE rd.role_id=#{roleId}
select count(1) from sys_user where dept_id = #{deptId} and del_flag = '0'
select max(CAST(jbdm AS SIGNED)) from sys_dept WHERE parent_id=#{parentId}

select d.dept_id, d.parent_id,d.jbdm, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, (select dept_name from sys_dept where dept_id = d.parent_id) parent_name from sys_dept d where d.dept_id = #{deptId}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_dept( dept_id, parent_id,jbdm, dept_name, order_num, leader, phone, email, status, create_by, create_time )values( #{deptId}, #{parentId}, ( select a.jbdm from(SELECT IFNULL( max(CAST(jbdm AS SIGNED))+1, (SELECT concat(jbdm,100) from sys_dept WHERE dept_id=#{parentId}) ) jbdm FROM sys_dept WHERE parent_id=#{parentId})a ),
#{deptName}, #{orderNum}, #{leader}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{status}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.delete: update sys_dept set del_flag = '2' where dept_id = #{deptId}
mapper.update: update sys_dept set jbdm='' where dept_id!=#{deptId} and jbdm like concat((select a.jbdm from (select jbdm from sys_dept where dept_id=#{deptId})a),'%')
